summary: This module provides utilities for integrating OpenAI's generation APIs with the Chainlit framework. It includes logic to automatically wrap OpenAI client calls so that each request and response is captured as a step in the Chainlit UI, and a helper to process newly created generation objects and update the corresponding UI elements.
business_intent: Enable seamless monitoring and visualization of OpenAI-powered interactions within Chainlit applications, allowing developers to track request lifecycles, display generated content in real time, and maintain a coherent conversational flow for end‑users.
